17853.quoteText: For purposes of California law, we may share with these parties all categories of personal information, except for background and criminal information, biometric information, and government identifiers.
17853.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

tosdr.case: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

17854.quoteText: We will not sell or rent your personal information for money.

17857.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

and returned

24184.quoteText: We use our own and third-party technologies such as cookies, web beacons, and mobile device identifiers to collect information about the use of our websites and mobile services.
24184.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels and device fingerprinting

24185.quoteText: web beacons allow us to know if a certain page was visited, an email was opened
24185.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

tosdr.case: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

24186.quoteText: We also receive information, such as device information and browsing information, from third parties for marketing purposes, for example to provide you with personalized ads on Walmart and third-party websites and mobile services.
24186.title: This service tracks you on other websites

tosdr.case: This service tracks you on other websites
tosdr.tldr: They don't directly track on third-party websites, but it is almost as if they did: they collect information from your browsing of third-party websites and then may target ads on you through those websites.

24187.quoteText: We use your personal information to provide you products and services, such as to fulfill your requests for products or to help us personalize our services and marketing to you.
